name: Stacey Garmon
text: Honest, friendly and not pretentious at all!  Needed repair done on my wedding set and their estimate was $350 less than another local jeweler!  I highly recommend!

name: David Driver
text: Great people to deal with, highly experienced and knowledgeable, highly recommended!!! They pay top dollar for your gold and silver...

name: Micah Moore
text: Mr. Larry did a fantastic job and in a very timely manner.  I will be returning for more business

name: Jennifer Morris
text: Mr. Larry did a fantastic job on sizing my diamond up in my engagement ring. He was so genuine and called to make sure I was okay with spending the money once he found a diamond that fit. My ring is beautiful! You will not be disappointed!

name: Michał Muniak
text: I'm your contractor from Poland (Solaris Optics). We still have two invoices that have been issued on May 2020 that you haven't pay. Is it your payment policy not to pay for the work that someone have done for you?

name: Roy & Rachel Eason
text: We finally picked up our clock.  It is running beautifully.

name: baron dogs
text: After waiting 5 months and being told its on the technicians desk now im told he has 20 more clocks ahead of mine

name: Tim Mitchell
text: Wonderful people, and outstanding service.

name: Doris Meissner
text: Very friendly and clean shop.  Lots of pretty clocks

name: Baxter - Stephens
text: Took my clock to be cleaned and fixed in March, after 6 months of excuses I finally picked my clock up 9 months after dropping off it off. Nothing had been done.I don't think they even looked at it!

name: Jabe Fincher
text: Very nice selection of clocks and watches. Polite and helpful staff.

name: Paul Riley
text: Very displeased with my experience with having my Mothers clock service. I was told when I dropped off the clock it would be 12 weeks due to their busy servicing schedule. I was a little shocked, but understood. "7 months later" the clock still had not been serviced. I called multiple times and got the standard response of "it should be done next week". I finally had enough of this and requested my clock returned and I would take it somewhere else. I picked up my clock which was disassembled and I had to carry it out to my vehicle. I requested a box to put all the parts in, and was told they didn't have a box. I wasn't even offered an explanation of why it wasn't service, just a unsincere sorry. I normally don't leave reviews, but I feel justified with this review.

name: Shirley Beasley
text: Enjoying my visit there

name: Frank Smith
text: He's a very competent clock repairman. I've taken two clocks in for repair and they are now running great. His prices are fair but he stays backlogged with repairs so it does take awhile to get it done. It's fully worth the wait though if you want your clock running right.

name: Jeanne Wonders
text:
I was shocked!!! When I called to ask about clock repair, I mentioned I had seen his ad in a local ad booklet and he hung up on me!!! Because I had heard such great reviews on this man I did in fact call the gentleman back.  I asked him why he hung up on me for asking him about having an original 1800s clock and pocket watch repaired and he hung up on me again!!!
I advise staying far away from this person!!!

name: Lynn Gardner
text: Fascinating owner -- his love for the craft is so evident and he makes clocks so much more than just timepieces because he can share the history- actually the stories of the people who made, owned and used them 'real time.'   He also will tell  you what can and cannot realistically be fixed! Mr.Hudson is a treasure!

name: Jacqui Sweet
text: Always a pleasure to chat with Bob and love the history lesson. He's amazing!

name: Sue Dobrinski
text: The owner, Bob, is a very pleasant and knowledgeable person. The directions he gave to get to his shop were perfect. He looked at the clock I brought in, had the part in shock and I will be picking it up on a few days. Prices are very reasonable.
